casebody.data:
MISCELLANEOUS DISMISSALS

99-1552. State ex rel. Ohio Patrolmen’s Benevolent Assn. v. Mentor.

In Mandamus. On August 16, 2000, this court granted in part and denied in part a writ of mandamus and granted attorney fees in part and ordered the parties to file a bill, documentation, and objections. Upon consideration of the joint motion to dismiss pending attorney fee issue upon settlement,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion to dismiss pending attorney fee issue upon settlement be, and hereby is, granted.
